title: SAHM Week: I've Lost My Sense of Self-Worth
description:
In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms Week: Charlotte is struggling since leaving her successful career to become a stay-at-home-mom. - Dr. Laura: "You are ferociously valuable and irreplaceable in the eyes of the family you've created."

Are you struggling in your role as a stay-at-home mom? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura’s book: “In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms” go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-in-praise-of-stay-at-home-moms

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
